summary:
Add unique great sword.
Like a moonlight greatsword of Dark souls.
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]0tY-QdlU3h8[/youtube]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------


[size=5][u][b][color=White]Warning!![/color][/size]
[size=4][/b]This mod is required DLC3 DragonBorn!![/u][/size]


Sorry.I don't speak English. I'm relying on machine translation.
Please forgive my poor English.


----------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------------------------------


[size=3][color=Yellow]What is This ?[/color][/size]

Add a unique Great Sword. It's effect like a BloodSkal Blade.

When power attacking with the blade, it sends out a horizontal or vertical energy blast that inflicts 30-150 points of damage, depending on the type of power attack used.

Damage of the light wave is increased by destruction skill of the player.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------------------------------


[size=3][color=white]Installation[/color][/size]

This Mod is exist in Two versions.
These differ in the means to obtain the weapon.


[size=2][b][color=lime]Craftable Edition[/color][/b][/size]
it's Very simple.
It can be made from a glass category.

[size=2][b][color=aqua]Seath Edition[/color][/b][/size]
This is possible to get a weapon by defeating the dragon that appears in the sky of Alftand.
...Dragon is very strong. be careful.

[u]You choose either favorite one, and, please install it.[/u]

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------------------------------

[size=3][color=#8fbc8f]Option File[/color][/size]

After installed one of the main file, Please overwrite.
Deep color texture file & narrow shape mesh file

[img]https://farm3.staticflickr.com/2917/14086042197_31ccdb88b2_o.png[/img]

[img]https://farm3.staticflickr.com/2938/14303458394_cdff3bab5a_o.jpg[/img]

[heading]Credit & Special Thanks[/heading]
[b]Script Source[/b]
SKYRIM MOD作成支援/相談スレ　Part5

[b]Equipment in screenshot & video[/b]
The Mad Masker by vicn
Combination Vanilla Outfit for UNP by sesamin

[b]Screenshot & Video Location[/b]
Review Studio by KahjiitRaj

I used it in addition to some modifications.
Thanks a lot, and I praise them.

[heading]Log[/heading]
2014 - 06.25　1.1 Release. Friendly fire fixed
2014 - 05.27　1.0 Release.
